verses.verse: Then we turned <S%H6437><s%>, and took our journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me: and we compassed <S%H5437><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Ye have compassed <S%H5437><s%> this mountain <S%H2022><s%> long enough <S%H7227><s%>: turn <S%H6437><s%> you northward <S%H6828><s%>.

And command <S%H6680><s%> thou the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye are to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the coast <S%H1366><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%>; and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you: take ye good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> unto yourselves therefore:

Meddle <S%H1624><s%> not with them; for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you of their land <S%H776><s%>, no, not so much as a foot <S%H7272><s%> breadth <S%H4096><s%> <S%H3709><s%>; because I have given <S%H5414><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto Esau <S%H6215><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%>.

Ye shall buy <S%H7666><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> of them for money <S%H3701><s%>, that ye may eat <S%H398><s%>; and ye shall also buy <S%H3739><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of them for money <S%H3701><s%>, that ye may drink <S%H8354><s%>.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee in all the works <S%H4639><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> thy walking <S%H3212><s%> through this great <S%H1419><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath been with thee; thou hast lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing <S%H1697><s%>.

And when we passed <S%H5674><s%> by from our brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%>, through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%> from Elath <S%H359><s%>, and from Ezion-gaber <S%H6100><s%>, we turned <S%H6437><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Distress <S%H6696><s%> not the Moabites <S%H4124><s%>, neither contend <S%H1624><s%> with them in battle <S%H4421><s%>: for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> thee of their land <S%H776><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%>; because I have given <S%H5414><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%>.

The Emims <S%H368><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein in times past <S%H6440><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%>, and tall <S%H7311><s%>, as the Anakims <S%H6062><s%>;
Which <S%H1992><s%> also were accounted <S%H2803><s%> giants <S%H7497><s%>, as the Anakims <S%H6062><s%>; but the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Emims <S%H368><s%>.

The Horims <S%H2752><s%> also dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%>; but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, when they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead; as Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession <S%H3425><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them.
Now rise up <S%H6965><s%>, said I, and get you over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered <S%H2218><s%>. And we went over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered <S%H2218><s%>.

And the space <S%H3117><s%> in which we came <S%H1980><s%> from Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>, until we were come over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered <S%H2218><s%>, was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>; until all the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were wasted out <S%H8552><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto them.
For indeed the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was against them, to destroy <S%H2000><s%> them from among <S%H7130><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>, until they were consumed <S%H8552><s%>.
¶ So it came to pass, when all the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were consumed <S%H8552><s%> and dead <S%H4191><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>,
That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Thou art to pass over <S%H5674><s%> through Ar <S%H6144><s%>, the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, this day <S%H3117><s%>:

And when thou comest nigh <S%H7126><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, distress <S%H6696><s%> them not, nor meddle <S%H1624><s%> with them: for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> thee of the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> any possession <S%H3425><s%>; because I have given <S%H5414><s%> it unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%>.

(That also was accounted <S%H2803><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of giants <S%H7497><s%>: giants <S%H7497><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein in old time <S%H6440><s%>; and the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Zamzummims <S%H2157><s%>;

A people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%>, and tall <S%H7311><s%>, as the Anakims <S%H6062><s%>; but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead:

As he did <S%H6213><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%>, when he destroyed <S%H8045><s%> the Horims <S%H2752><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead even unto this day <S%H3117><s%>:

And the Avims <S%H5761><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Hazerim <S%H2699><s%>, even unto Azzah <S%H5804><s%>, the Caphtorims <S%H3732><s%>, which came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Caphtor <S%H3731><s%>, destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead.)

¶ Rise ye up <S%H6965><s%>, take your journey <S%H5265><s%>, and pass over <S%H5674><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%>: behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and his land <S%H776><s%>: begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and contend <S%H1624><s%> with him in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

This day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> of thee and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of thee upon the nations <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5971><s%> that are under the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%>, who shall hear <S%H8085><s%> report <S%H8088><s%> of thee, and shall tremble <S%H7264><s%>, and be in anguish <S%H2342><s%> because of thee <S%H6440><s%>.

¶ And I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through thy land <S%H776><s%>: I will go <S%H3212><s%> along by the high way <S%H1870><s%> <S%H1870><s%>, I will neither turn <S%H5493><s%> unto the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

Thou shalt sell <S%H7666><s%> me meat <S%H400><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>, that I may eat <S%H398><s%>; and give <S%H5414><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>, that I may drink <S%H8354><s%>: only I will pass through <S%H5674><s%> on my feet <S%H7272><s%>;

(As the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ar <S%H6144><s%>, did <S%H6213><s%> unto me;) until I shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> us.

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not let us pass <S%H5674><s%> by him: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hardened <S%H7185><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and made his heart <S%H3824><s%> obstinate <S%H553><s%>, that he might deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, as appeareth this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have begun <S%H2490><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%>, that thou mayest inherit <S%H3423><s%> his land <S%H776><s%>.
Then Sihon <S%H5511><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us, he and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, to fight <S%H4421><s%> at Jahaz <S%H3096><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> us; and we smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And we took <S%H3920><s%> all his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> the men <S%H4962><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%>, and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, of every city <S%H5892><s%>, we left <S%H7604><s%> none to remain <S%H8300><s%>:
Only the cattle <S%H929><s%> we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> unto ourselves, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which we took <S%H3920><s%>.

From Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, which is by the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and from the city <S%H5892><s%> that is by the river <S%H5158><s%>, even unto Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, there was not one city <S%H7151><s%> too strong <S%H7682><s%> for us: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> all unto us <S%H6440><s%>:

Only unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> thou camest <S%H7126><s%> not, nor unto any place <S%H3027><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, nor unto the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, nor unto whatsoever the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> forbad <S%H6680><s%> us.
